Question
========

Which of the following statements is **incorrect**?

If there is multicollinearity then.... 
Answerlist
----------
* ...the proportion of variance explained is very large.
* ...a significant model can still give large P values for the predictors.
* ...the standard errors of regression parameters become larger.
* ...Variance Inflation Factors (VIFs) will be high.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
